summary: REQ-8 is partially implemented: the centralized website domain in instituteDetails.ts is updated to www.smartdesk7.com, but the diff summary does not provide direct evidence that the Site Footer and Contact page links use https://www.smartdesk7.com and open in a new tab. REQ-9 appears incomplete: Home page changes are indicated, but the two image files are not added anywhere under a public static assets path in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: The website link shown in the Site Footer opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab; the website link shown on the Contact page opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab (using the centralized institute details).
missing_requirements.reason: Only the centralized value is shown updated; no diff evidence is provided for frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx or frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx link href/target behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the two uploaded images as static assets under a public path and ensure they load correctly in the browser.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so the uploaded images (SDPH-1.jpg and 1000_F_755840623_3JuwWAI0IdvB5xOmCIqvUZmPyfLoHd3M-1.jpg) are not present under frontend/public (or similar) per the provided summary.
